alert.note: Alert for Caddo (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 5:57PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Caddo Parish, southeastern Harrison and north central Panola Counties through 630 PM CDT... At 557 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Elysian Fields, or 12 miles south of Marshall, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Marshall, Greenwood, Waskom, Elysian Fields, Scottsville, Jonesville and Leigh. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
